Subject: Enterprise Auditor SSL Issue
Description: SSL certificate issue when accessing published reports
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: Access published reports to see a warning
What_We_Know__c: Same issue as with previous NTM ticket probably cert is not where it supposed to be
Next_Steps__c: Meeting as soon as I confirm what exactly it affects AIC or PR
Solution_Comment__c:
On this meeting I've checked your SSL settings and tested the connection.
After re-binding the certificate to 8082 I've checked the listening port list. Unfortunately, your 8082 port was not showing up, giving me the idea that it might be blocked by something in your environment.
I've suggested using a random high port instead, 45565, to which you've agreed.
After re-binding certificate to that port, there are no more issues with SSL and you can use https connection for the Web Console.
